00032 struct TreeDB* createTreeDB()
00033 {
00034     struct TreeDB* tree = (struct TreeDB*)malloc(sizeof(struct TreeDB));
00035     tree->root = NULL;
00036     return tree;
00037 }

00039 /* 
00040  * @brief Destruct the TREEDB
00041  */
00042 void deleteTreeDB(struct TreeDB* tree){
00043     
00044     if(tree != NULL && tree->root != NULL)
00045         deleteTreeNode(tree->root);
00046         free(tree->root); 
00047 }

00054 bool insert (struct TreeDB* tree, struct TreeEntry* newEntry){
00055    
00056     //Before we start, we should check if the database is empty, if so, there is no need to continue.
00057         if(tree == NULL)
00058         return false;
00059     
00060     //BASE CASE -> When we find where to insert the node, we now insert the node.
00061     if(tree->root == NULL)
00062     {
00063         //Create the TreeNode since it has not been created before.
00064         tree->root = createTreeNode(newEntry);
00065         return true;
00066     }
00067         
00068     //We must retrieve the name of the key!     
00069     char* nodeName = getTableName((struct TreeEntry*)getEntry((struct TreeNode*)tree->root));
00070     
00071     //Once we have the key (char* name) - We now compare to see if it exists by traversing through the BST
00072     
00073     //IF THE KEY ALREADY EXISTS - RETURN FALSE
00074     if(strcmp(getTableName(newEntry), nodeName) == 0)
00075     {
00076         return false;
00077     }
00078     
00079     //IF THE KEY value is smaller go to the left of the node
00080     else if(strcmp(getTableName(newEntry), nodeName) < 0)
00081     {
00082         if(getLeft(tree->root) == NULL)
00083         {
00084             setLeft(tree->root, createTreeNode(newEntry));
00085             return true;
00086         }
00087         
00088         //recurse to the left
00089         return insertTable(getLeft(tree->root), newEntry);
00090     }
00091     
00092     //IF THE KEY value is larger, go to the right of the node
00093     else if(strcmp(getTableName(newEntry), nodeName) > 0)
00094     {
00095         if(getRight(tree->root) == NULL)
00096         {
00097             setRight(tree->root, createTreeNode(newEntry));
00098             return true;
00099         }
00100 
00101         //recurse to the right
00102         return insertTable(getRight(tree->root), newEntry);
00103     }
00104     
00105     return false;
00106 }
00107 
00113 struct TreeEntry* find(struct TreeDB* tree, char* name)
00114 {
00115         if(tree == NULL)
00116         return NULL;
00117 
00118     if(tree->root == NULL)
00119     {
00120     return NULL;
00121     }
00122         
00123     //Retrieve the entry to compare.    
00124     char* nodeName = getTableName(getEntry(tree->root));
00125 
00126     //SAME ALGORITHM as INSERT
00127     if(strcmp(nodeName, name) == 0)
00128     {
00129         return getEntry(tree->root);
00130     }
00131     else if(strcmp(name, nodeName) < 0)
00132     {
00133         if(getLeft(tree->root) == NULL)
00134         {
00135             return NULL;
00136         }
00137 
00138         return findTable(getLeft(tree->root), name);
00139     }
00140     else if(strcmp(name, nodeName) > 0)
00141     {
00142         if(getRight(tree->root) == NULL)
00143         {
00144             return NULL;
00145         }
00146 
00147         return findTable(getRight(tree->root), name);
00148     }
00149 
00150     return NULL;
00151 }

00157 bool removeDBEntry(struct TreeDB* tree, char* name)
00158 {
00159     if(tree == NULL || tree->root == NULL)
00160         return false;
00161 
00162     struct TreeNode* temp = NULL;
00163     
00164    tree->root = removeTable(tree->root, name, &temp);
00165 
00166     if(temp == NULL)
00167         return false;
00168 
00169     //set left and right to null 
00170     setLeft(temp, NULL);
00171     setRight(temp, NULL);
00172     deleteTreeNode(temp);
00173     free(temp);
00174     return true;
00175 }
00176 
00181 void clear(struct TreeDB* tree)
00182 {
00183     if(tree != NULL && tree->root != NULL)
00184     {
00185         deleteTreeNode(tree->root);
00186         free(tree->root);
00187     }
00188 
00189     tree->root = NULL;
00190 }

00193 void printTree(struct TreeDB* tree)
00194 {
00195     if(tree == NULL || tree->root == NULL)
00196     {
00197         return;
00198     }
00199 
00200     printNodes(tree->root);
00201     printf("\n");
00202 
00203     return;
00204 }
